Pre-Game Insights: The Spurs are favored by 5.5 points, and the over/under is 216.5.
Miscellaneous Highlights: San Antonio went 22-60 overall, 14-37 in Western Conference play and 12-29 at home during the 2023-24 season.
Portland went 21-61 overall and 8-44 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
The Spurs averaged 15.4 points off of turnovers, 12.7 second-chance points and 39.7 bench points last season.
The Trail Blazers averaged 23.1 assists per game on 39.4 made field goals last season.
The Spurs are missing Devin Vassell, Tre Jones, and Jeremy Sochan due to injuries, while the Trail Blazers are missing Matisse Thybulle and Shaedon Sharpe.
